00012 #ifndef CHAIN_IF_H_
00013 #define CHAIN_IF_H_
00014 
00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * File chain event generator output interface. Creates a process generator with *
00017  * separate file for each subprocess.                                            *
00018  *                                                                               *
00019  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00020 
00021 #include <map>
00022 #include <Camgen/if_base.h>
00023 #include <Camgen/if_engine.h>
00024 #include <Camgen/if_output.h>
00025 
00026 namespace Camorra
00027 {
00028     template<class model_t>class chain_interface: public interface_base<model_t>
00029     {
00030         typedef interface_base<model_t> base_type;
00031 
00032         public:
00033 
00034             /* Type definitions: */
00035 
00036             typedef typename base_type::generator_type generator_type;
00037             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00038             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00039             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00040 
00041             struct sub_interface
00042             {
00043                 interface_output<model_t>* output;
00044                 interface_engine<model_t>* engine;
00045             };
00046 
00047             /* Public constructors/destructors: */
00048             /*----------------------------------*/
00049 
00051 
00052             chain_interface(generator_type* gen_,interface_output<model_t>* output_,interface_engine<model_t>* engine_=NULL):base_type(gen_),output(output_),engine(engine_)
00053             {
00054                 std::string namebase(output->file_name);
00055                 if(namebase.size()==0)
00056                 {
00057                     namebase="proc";
00058                 }
00059                 namebase.append("_");
00060                 int digits=0;
00061                 int step=1;
00062                 while(step<this->processes())
00063                 {
00064                     ++digits;
00065                     step*=10;
00066                 }
00067                 if(digits==0)
00068                 {
00069                     digits=1;
00070                 }
00071                 for(size_type i=0;i<this->processes();++i)
00072                 {
00073                     size_type n=this->gen->process_id(i);
00074                     std::stringstream ss;
00075                     ss<<namebase<<std::setw(digits)<<std::setfill('0')<<n;
00076                     std::string fname(ss.str());
00077                     interface_output<model_t>* sub_output=output->create(fname);
00078                     sub_output->open_file();
00079                     interface_engine<model_t>* sub_engine=NULL;
00080                     if(engine!=NULL)
00081                     {
00082                         sub_engine=engine->clone();
00083                         sub_engine->set_generator(gen_);
00084                         sub_engine->add_branches(sub_output);
00085                     }
00086                     sub_output->branch(&(this->w),"weight");
00087                     sub_output->branch(&(this->proc_id),"proc_id");
00088                     sub_interface sub_int={sub_output,sub_engine};
00089                     sub_interfaces[n]=sub_int;
00090                 }
00091             }
00092 
00094 
00095             ~chain_interface()
00096             {
00097                 for(typename std::map<int,sub_interface>::iterator it=sub_interfaces.begin();it!=sub_interfaces.end();++it)
00098                 {
00099                     if((it->second).engine!=NULL)
00100                     {
00101                         delete (it->second).engine;
00102                     }
00103                     delete (it->second).output;
00104                 }
00105                 if(engine!=NULL)
00106                 {
00107                     delete engine;
00108                 }
00109                 delete output;
00110             }
00111 
00112             /* Public modifiers: */
00113             /*-------------------*/
00114 
00117 
00118             bool write()
00119             {
00120                 bool q=true;
00121                 for(typename std::map<int,sub_interface>::iterator it=sub_interfaces.begin();it!=sub_interfaces.end();++it)
00122                 {
00123                     q&=(it->second.output->close_file());
00124                 }
00125                 return q;
00126             }
00127 
00128             /* Public readout methods: */
00129             /*-------------------------*/
00130 
00132 
00133             size_type event_size() const
00134             {
00135                 typename std::map<int,sub_interface>::const_iterator it=sub_interfaces.begin();
00136                 if(it==sub_interfaces.end())
00137                 {
00138                     return 0;
00139                 }
00140                 interface_engine<model_t>* e=it->second.engine;
00141                 if(e==NULL)
00142                 {
00143                     return 0;
00144                 }
00145                 return (e->event_size()+sizeof(value_type));
00146             }
00147 
00149 
00150             size_type file_size(size_type i) const
00151             {
00152                 typename std::map<int,sub_interface>::const_iterator it=sub_interfaces.find(i);
00153                 if(it==sub_interfaces.end())
00154                 {
00155                     return 0;
00156                 }
00157                 interface_engine<model_t>* e=it->second.engine;
00158                 if(e==NULL)
00159                 {
00160                     return 0;
00161                 }
00162                 return (e->event_size()+sizeof(value_type))*(it->output_evts);
00163             }
00164 
00166 
00167             bool write_statistics() const
00168             {
00169                 if(output==NULL)
00170                 {
00171                     return false;
00172                 }
00173                 std::ofstream ofs;
00174                 std::string fname(output->file_name+"_stats.dat");
00175                 ofs.open(fname.c_str());
00176                 if(ofs.is_open())
00177                 {
00178                     this->print_statistics(ofs);
00179                     ofs.close();
00180                     return true;
00181                 }
00182                 else
00183                 {
00184                     LOG(warning)<<"Failed to open file "<<fname<<"..."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00185                 }
00186                 return false;
00187             }
00188 
00189         protected:
00190 
00192 
00193             bool fill_event()
00194             {
00195                 typename std::map<int,sub_interface>::iterator it=sub_interfaces.find(this->proc_id);
00196                 if(it==sub_interfaces.end())
00197                 {
00198                     std::cerr<<"process id "<<this->proc_id<<" not found in map..."<<std::endl;
00199                     return false;
00200                 }
00201                 if(it->second.engine!=NULL)
00202                 {
00203                     it->second.engine->fill();
00204                 }
00205                 return it->second.output->write_event(this->gen);
00206             }
00207 
00208         private:
00209 
00210             /* Interface output object (unused): */
00211 
00212             interface_output<model_t>* output;
00213 
00214             /* Interface engine instance: */
00215 
00216             interface_engine<model_t>* engine;
00217 
00218             /* Collection of sub-process interfaces: */
00219 
00220             std::map<int,sub_interface> sub_interfaces;
00221     };
00222 }
00223 
00224 #endif /*EVTS_IF_H_*/
